DescriptionData.Title: AJs 23" Leg Warmers
DescriptionData.Description:
These leg warmers are perfect for teams or any dance group that needs an easy uniform accessory. They are also a nice fashion statement for anyone, and will keep you warm. They are stretchy enough to cover blue jeans, but have enough elastic in them to keep them in place.
These leg warmers are made from 91% acrylic and 9% elastic. Sized to fit most adults (23 inches in length). Made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Solid color, heavy weight, tube style leg warmers
Approximately 23 inches in length, sized to fit most adults
Flexible 91% acrylic and 9% elastic yarn maintains shape
Versatile for every day wear, exercise, dance or for uniforms.
